channel.title: Jad and healers behaviour

item.title: Jad and healers behaviour
item.dc:creator: @zubiri zubiri
item.description:
@zubiri wrote:

[b]/*

File Name: JadCave.java
Creator: Minutes
Date: 19/12/08

*/
public class JadCave {

public void getWavekillCount(client c)
{
    if(c.TzWave != -1)
        if(c.TzWave == 1)
            c.KilledTz = 0;
        else
        if(c.TzWave == 2)
            c.KilledTz = 1;
    
}

public void SpawnNewWave(client c)
{
    if(c.TzWave == 1)
    {
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2380, 5105, c.heightLevel);
        c.NeededKills = 1;
    }
    if(c.TzWave == 2)
    {
        c.talk("Look out, here comes TzTok-Jad!", 2617);
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2745, 2400, 5083, c.heightLevel);
        c.NeededKills = 2;

    }
}
public void healJad(client c)
{
    for(int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++)
        if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null)
        {
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2745)
	{
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].heightLevel == c.heightLevel)
	{
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP < server.npcHandler.npcs[i].MaxHP)
	{
            	server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP += 5;
	}
                }
}
    }

}
}
[/b]
I am a java noob, what exactly does the healers for loop mean?
Before I even ask how to add the rest of the healer’s behaviour.
What is the rest of the healers’ behaviour?

  1. Spawn next to jad
  2. Start healing him?

IF attacked, retaliate
IF jad moves while healing?

Any idea or approximation as to how much do they heal?

Read full topic
